TransformCoordinate

public vec2 TransformCoordinate( mat4 m );
Transforms the vector by a matrix treating it as a vertex.
Multiplies the 3d vector (x,y,1) by the matrix and then divides it by the w component.

TransformNormal

public vec2 TransformNormal( mat4 m );
Transforms the vector by a matrix treating it as a normal.
